item.description:
What You’ll Experience in this class:

  • Simple Qi Gong movements for health and vitality
  • Self-massage and Relaxation
  • The video: Introduction to Qi Gong and Qi Gong massage

• Delicious tea and more energy!

 

Get to know the power of  your body and mind through Qi Gong

Qi Gong is an ancient, healing Chinese practice that is often called Chinese yoga or moving meditation.

Qi Gong movements provide an excellent stretch for every limb,  awaken your brain, clarify your mind,  and stimulate the energy flow throughout the entire body, but in a gentle, caring way.  This practice is a good choice if you are feeling sad or depressed, or at any time you want to open yourself up to a flow of positive energy.  It is a great way to release stress and recharge yourself with a smile.

 

Friday, June  15.  7pm - 8:30pm

Please wear loose clothes, and have your dinner at least 30 mins before class.

See you soon!
item.name: Introduction to Qi Gong
